He has gained extensive global experience working with high-profile projects in Europe, Middle East and Asia from feasibility stage to concept design, to detailed design of extremely fast track projects such as the prestigious BT, Global Center and Hilton. Chris recently completed the project for Fujitsu working closely with The Uptime Institute.
